faqs.question: How does the AI content generation work?
faqs.answer: Our AI uses advanced natural language processing models trained on diverse datasets to generate human-like content based on your prompts and requirements.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. You'll continue to have access to paid features until the end of your billing period.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all Pro features. No credit card required to start your trial.

faqs.question: What languages are supported?
faqs.answer: We currently support over 25 languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and many more.

faqs.question: How secure is my data?
faqs.answer: We use enterprise-grade security measures including AES-256 encryption, SOC 2 Type II compliance, and never store your generated content beyond the session.
